participant_1.background:
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
i have a collection of video games.
I spend most of my time working, but I make time for my friends and family when I can.
i try to do my job as best as i can.
i am an avid runner.

participant_2.background:
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.
I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center.
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems.
i like going to canada.

content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking!  I just got done reading a book about mermaids.  What about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm a bit nervous because my husband is going out of town for work for a few weeks and I'm going to be on my own with the kids.
Oh, I can understand that. That must be tough!  How are you planning to make sure you have enough time for everything you need to do?
I'm not sure yet.  I'm thinking about making a list of everything that needs to be done and then prioritizing it.
That's a great idea!  I'm sure you'll figure it out.  What are your kids' names?
My daughter is named Olivia and my son is named Benjamin.  They're both in preschool.
Oh, that's great!  I love those names.  I'm sure they're both very cute.
Thank you!  They are.  They're my whole world.
I can imagine!  They're lucky to have such a great mom.
Thank you!  That's sweet of you to say.
No problem!  I'm sure you're going to do great taking care of them while your husband is gone.
